item.description:
As requested, I'm organizing a game night at the Storrs Starbucks (1244 Storrs Rd, Storrs Mansfield, CT 06269 ). We'll get the big table so we have some room to play, but we probably should have no more than 8 people so we fit. :) I'll bring Scrabble and a deck of cards -- if you have something else you're keen to play, haul it along.

Because space is limited on this one, please be serious about your YES RSVP :)
Please park in the lot in the back so you don't risk being towed.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the people with games at the big table

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Table Games at Storrs Starbucks
